description:
Located next to I-4 in Altamonte Springs, Presser Law, P.A. knows experience matters and full and fair compensation is what injury victims deserve. Our focus is on personal injury cases throughout Florida, including Seminole County, Florida and we understand the stresses that come along with being injured through no fault of your own. We take pride in our aggressive, no-nonsense approach in handling cases as well as our open communication with our clients – which our clients find refreshing. From your Free Initial Case Review, our team will begin to investigate the facts of your case and fight for you to ensure you find the justice you deserve.

Personal Injury Cases

We proudly represent all injury victims throughout Florida, including Seminole County, for actions involving:

  • Wrongful Death, Brain Injury, Spine Injury and Broken Bones
  • Motor Vehicle and Car Accidents, DUI/Distracted Driver Accidents
  • Motorcycle Accidents, Tractor Trailer Accidents, Bicycle and Pedestrians Accidents
  • Slip and Falls, Trip and Falls, Negligent Maintenance, Negligent Security
  • Dog Bites and all other injuries from animals
  • All other personal injury cases

Attorney Justin H. Presser ǀ Call 407.216.2000

For over ten years, Justin H. Presser, Esquire has fought for hundreds of injury and wrongful death victims and against insurance companies. Put our experience in handling these matters to work for you so you can concentrate on what you really should - getting better.

For the past six years, Attorney Presser has been voted by his peers as a top injury attorney in Seminole County and Central Florida. Call today for your FREE Initial Case Review.
